document.full_text: spaniard tommy robredo, despite being hampered by a hamstring strain, crushed american sam querrey 6-1 6-3 on wednesday to become the first player through to the indian wells quarter-finals.
document.title: robredo and del potro reach last eight at indian wells
lines_and_colors: spaniard tommy robredo, despite being hampered by a hamstring strain, crushed american sam querrey 6-1 6-3 on wednesday to become the first player through to the indian wells quarter-finals.
